name: bp_cpt2
description: Automatically adds appropriate CPT/HCPCS billing codes based on blood pressure measurements from vitals or note state changes

protocols.description: Handles blood pressure measurements from vitals commands and returns appropriate CPT-II codes
Analyzes clinical documentation using AI to determine if blood pressure treatment plans are documented and adds appropriate treatment plan codes (G8753-G8755)
Action button in note header that manually triggers BP billing code analysis without pushing charges
